TEXT.S:
Butch Beard nalecuhan i Hardinsburg, Kentucky, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Butch Beard i 1969 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 10, namapili' tu nu Atlanta Hawks putiput.
u siwkay niza u Amilika a tademaw, tatama. u kawaw niza u mimaliay. 5 bulad 5 demiad, 1947 a mihca, Butch Beard, miunduay.
